title: Anglorum lacrim√¶ in a sad passion complayning the death of our late soueraigne Lady Queene Elizabeth: yet comforted againe by the vertuous hopes of our most royall and renowned King Iames: whose Maiestie God long continue.
author: Rogers, Thomas, 1573 or 4-1609 or 10.
